title: Command line tool to enable SSL
description:
To simplify the task of enabling SSL in Solr, suggest to

	Document in refGuide how to achieve a trusted SSL cert through letsencrypt.com instead of generating self-signed (self signed can still be documented as an alternative)
	Create a bin/solr ssl tool to assist in converting from pem to jks, installing the files, updating solr.in.sh, enabling urlScheme etc



This JIRA should probably have a few sub tasks
